summary: Both REQ-35 and REQ-36 appear to be fully implemented. The useDashboardStats hook now computes and returns a statusBreakdown object, Dashboard.tsx consumes it and displays the three additional stat cards, and both DailyReport.tsx and DateRangeReport.tsx show the status breakdown section (Pending, Completed, Cancelled) only after report generation, using the same filtered trip records as the other summary stats.
